events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position at our company. Our recruitment team will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software developer role requiring backend development skills.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your application to guide you through the next phases of the interview process and ensure a smooth communication flow.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background in software engineering and your experience with various development technologies.
Thank you for your time during the screening call. I am enthusiastic about the opportunity to contribute my skills in software development to your engineering team.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10:00 AM UTC. The session will focus on coding challenges and system design relevant to the software engineer role.
You completed the technical interview with excellent performance on coding problems and demonstrated strong problem-solving abilities in system design.
An HR interview has been arranged for April 25th at 1:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, team fit, and compensation expectations.
The HR interview went well, and we appreciate your thoughtful answers regarding workplace values and your career aspirations.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the software engineer position, including details on salary, benefits, and starting date in the official offer letter.
Thank you for your positive response to the offer. We are excited to have you join our engineering team and begin contributing to our projects.
You have formally accepted the offer for the software engineer role. We look forward to welcoming you onboard soon and will initiate onboarding preparations.
Your onboarding process has started with the distribution of access credentials, team introductions, and initial training schedules to integrate you successfully.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering team. Congratulations and welcome aboard!
